p: Necropsy of the ewe of experiment 1 that died at 4 dpi (#1764) revealed macroscopic abnormalities: extensive haemorrhages in the uterine wall, at the base of the placentomes and within the placentomes. Necropsy of ewes that were euthanized at 4 dpi in experiment 2 revealed placentomes that did not show any macroscopic abnormalities.
